name: At the Gates of Moscow 1941
overview: At the Gates of Moscow 1941 is a turn-based division-level wargame set during the Operation Typhoon (World War 2), a German attempt to capture Russian capital. The two scenarios or the whole campaign (1 September 1941 - 6 March 1942) can be played from either German or Soviet side. The game features variable weather and ground conditions (e.g. secondary roads made impassable due to mud), units hidden by "fog of war", intelligence reports, entrenchment, air power, railway transport, partisans and militia units (for Soviets). The hex-based map is displayed in either close-up or strategical scale. This computer game can be also played alongside a board game (of the same name), released concurrently.
